name: Safehaven
description:
Take a vacation trip to Safehaven, a casual game produced at University of Central Florida for Casual Game Production. Our challenge for this semester was to take a Classic Atari game, and revamp it into something new. For our inspiration we chose the classic game of Warlords, a player verses player battle for their kingdom! We took that mechanic, and made it into a co-op brick breaking experience, with enemies, puzzles, competitive battles, and even an overworld to explore.

Credits

Kaitlin Black - Artist

Jared Gray - Programmer

Rachel Lichter - Producer, Creative Director, UI Design

Daniel Ramon - Artist
